import React from 'react'; import Img1 from '../assets/images/img1.jpg'; import Img2 from '../assets/images/img2.jpg'; import Map from '../assets/images/map.png'; import Logo1 from '../assets/images/logo1.png'; function about() { return (
About Us
Helping people to pursue
their dreams

We have a noble cause to solve people’s monetary and domestic issues by educating, assisting, and serving people.

Contact Now
We’re here to support humanity every step of the way.
We’re here to support humanity every step of the way.
Mision & Vision
Aiding humanity as much as possible has and will be our mission.

Our vision is to reduce suffering in society. We are driven by motivation and passion for eliminating the problems of people. The key points of our vision are:

  • Spread the right knowledge of Islam
  • Remove illiteracy from the society
  • Financial and medical aid for everyone
  • Free legal assistance for people in dire situations
About Us
Working to provide maximum relief to the society
Our Humanitarian Services

Funding the medical expenses and bills of unfortunate families.

Aiding people in finding the righteous proposals in compliance with Islamic sharia.

Help spread accurate knowledge and educating people about the teachings of Islam.

Providing resources and raising funds for the less fortunate and underprivileged.

Assisting people with free legal advice and helping them win legal battles.

We believe in free basic education and have been helping several children get it.

) } export default about
